column2: but a few things that I highly recommend
column3: if available: The uni shrimp pasta (yes
column10: we recently tried the baked sea bass and when we bit into it
column11: both considered it to be very bland. THEN we dug into the spinach/bacon/onion concoction UNDERNEATH the bass
column12: which completely changed the flavor of the entire dish! I couldn't get over how much better it tasted!
